ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just talked to a Pred named Phobia. She said you two had an agreemant, about attacking something called the Fist. Anyway she is trying to get troops

::K9::

"I just talked to a Pred named Phobia. She said you two had an
agreemant, about attacking something called the Fist. Anyway she is
trying to get troops from the Predicons. She wants you to stop a group
of Maximals, that keep attacking those Preds, and killing off the Preds
she is trying to get. She also wanted me to give you this data crystal.
It has bios on all the Preds." He said, holding out the crystal.
